text:
@DrRPNishank @narendramodi @AmitShah @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @HRDMinistry @mygovindia @transformIndia @PIB_India @MIB_India @DDNewslive I’m waiting for ur that tweet when u wil say :- Due to the covid-19 we r concerned abt the health of our studnts ... So we have decided to cancel FINAL YEAR exams of this year N students will be promoted on the basis of their last year performance.
#NoExamsInCovid
